sentences.english: Each read from the descriptor retrieves an outgoing packet which was routed to the interface.
sentences.chinese: 逐行读取说明符将可以检索到通向接口的出站数据包。

sentences.english: However, line-by-line parsing is not always what you want.
sentences.chinese: 但是，您并非总是需要逐行解析。

sentences.english: It is the progressive scan signal which is passed to the display 40.
sentences.chinese: 正是该逐行扫描信号被传递到显示器40。

sentences.english: This is available in both interlaced and progressively scanned at a varying number for frame rates.
sentences.chinese: 隔行扫描和逐行扫描有不同数量的有效视频帧速率。

sentences.english: The comparison is done on a row-by-row basis.
That circuit works based on charge transfer principle and resets row by row.
sentences.chinese: 该电路基于电荷转移原理，采用逐行复位方式。

sentences.english: It reads data from standard input line by line.
sentences.chinese: 它从标准输入逐行读取数据。

sentences.english: Accurate progressive scanning technology, high definition image rebroadcast, reproducing ultimate beautiful pictures.
sentences.chinese: 精确逐行扫描技术，高清晰影像重播，再现至美画面。

sentences.english: It is one of the more commonly used functions because line-by-line parsing often makes sense.
sentences.chinese: 它是一个更常用的函数，因为逐行解析通常会有意义。

sentences.english: We'll take it line-by-line and size -by-size.
sentences.chinese: 我们会把它逐行和尺寸的大小。
